amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for Rhode Island College, Providence, Rhode Island, for development of a Portuguese and Lusophone Studies Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for Rhode Island College, Providence, Rhode Island, for development of a Portuguese and Lusophone Studies Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A049) Failed by voice vote.
